name: openwrt-control-panel
description: Modern management interface for OpenWrt routers (44KB / 10KB gzipped)

scripts.deploy: cat custom/index.html | ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -p 2222 root@127.0.0.1 'cat > /www/custom/index.html' && cat custom/app.js | ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -p 2222 root@127.0.0.1 'cat > /www/custom/app.js' && cat custom/app.css | ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -p 2222 root@127.0.0.1 'cat > /www/custom/app.css'
